body: This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/hstox/48)

comment_regular_data.body:
Review status: 0 of 2 files reviewed at latest revision, 1 unresolved discussion, some commit checks failed.

---

_[.travis.yml, line 11 [r1]](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/hstox/48#-KNqVHdDRge2-oEiQsC-:-KNqVHdDRge2-oEiQsC0:685814410) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/hstox/blob/7eaf61f18cceb941c6c4cd9a16540976a6a1ce41/.travis.yml#L11)):_

> ``` YAML
>     packages:
>       - clang-format-3.8
>       - clang-tidy-3.8
> ```

Why `clang-tidy`?  Only `clang-format` is invoked.
Also, why not the version-independent `clang-format` virtual package? (assuming it is provided in `llvm-toolchain-precise-3.8`)

---

_Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/hstox/48)_

<!-- Sent from Reviewable.io -->

_[.travis.yml, line 8 [r1]](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/hstox/48#-KNqXM0e_MonqpKYkkI0:-KNqXM0fwYA8Gheb_Dzq:521688706) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/hstox/blob/7eaf61f18cceb941c6c4cd9a16540976a6a1ce41/.travis.yml#L8)):_

> ``` YAML
>     sources:
>       - llvm-toolchain-precise-3.8
>       - ubuntu-toolchain-r-test
> ```

There could be a comment explaining that this is a PPA that contains a GCC backport, and that it is needed for the LLVM 3.8 tools on Precise (due to the `libstdc++` version)

---

_Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/hstox/48)_

<!-- Sent from Reviewable.io -->

Previously, nbraud (Nicolas Braud-Santoni) wrote… > Why `clang-tidy`? Only `clang-format` is invoked. > Also, why not the version-independent `clang-format` virtual package? (assuming it is provided in `llvm-toolchain-precise-3.8`) >
> It was WIP. I didn't know how to invoke clang-tidy yet, so I've added it now that I know. --- _Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/hstox/48)_

commit.message:
Add clang-format/tidy build step.

To check formatting and coding style on travis.

Also, moved the "configure"-style checks into configure.mk.

committer iphydf <iphydf@users.noreply.github.com> 1469912200 +0100

Add clang-format/tidy build step.

To check formatting and coding style on travis.

Also, moved the "configure"-style checks into configure.mk.
